Description.Title: Fragaria vesca subsp. vesca H4x4 leaf gDNA

Comment.Paragraph: Genomic DNA was isolated from from young leaves 'DNAeasy Mini Plant RNA kit' (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA library was prepared according to modified standard Illumina protocol (http://www.illumina.com/). Briefly, 7 ug of genomic DNA in a 50 uL of TE buffer (10 mM Tris, 1 mM EDTA; pH 8.0) was mixed with 750 uL of nebulization buffer [25% (v/v) glycerol in TE buffer] and sheared for 7 min. in a nebulizer (Invitrogen) using compressed nitrogen at 36 psi. Before ligation with Illumina adapters the fragmented DNA was purified using 'QIAquick PCR Purification Kit' (Qiagen). Illumina library size was in 300-350 bp range.
